body: 我看完只想說只有第一對是純純的甜🙃其他沉重的跟什麼一樣⋯⋯
看完第二對的故事我只想說漫畫總是把很沉重的事情簡單帶過，但在現實中這種情況帶來的是無法抹滅的痛⋯⋯
第一對好可愛！！！！好喜歡他們

OMG I READ THIS BEFORE IN A CONVENTION and I kinda agree with you @shower kidnapping and rape is unjustified but I think people that are old enough to know that pornography exists are aware of the implications of these acts can have on people lives and know that this is just so wrong in so many levels

The kidnapping story is very FUCKED UP!!! Not just because of Stockholm Syndrome, but that the kidnapping was, in a messed up way, justified. Because the blonde boy told the old man to take the other boy instead, and the old was trapped for so long that by the time he escaped the world was unrecognizable to him. Because of blondie the guy knew only kidnapping and rape in that room as a familiarity. That's very tragic considering that can happen in real life.😰😢
